specifications.raw_text_preview:
Instrument Accessories and Installation Standards
Introduction
Beyond primary instruments, successful refinery instrumentation depends on quality accessories and meticulous installation. This document covers mounting hardware, impulse tubing, fittings, regulators, enclosures, instrument air systems, cables and junction boxes. These elements ensure that instruments perform reliably in the harsh refinery environment.
Applicable Standards
API 551 – Instrument Installation Practices.
ASTM A269 / ASTM A213: stainless steel tubing specifications.
ASME B31.3 – Process Piping: piping design and materials.
NEMA 250 / IEC 60529: enclosure ratings.
IEC 60079: explosion protection for enclosures and glands.
Accessories
Mounting hardware: brackets, stands and clamps fabricated from 316 SS; designed for rigidity and ease of maintenance.
Impulse tubing: seamless stainless steel tubing (typically 316 SS, ½ inch OD); used for pressure and DP transmitters; include tube fittings and support saddles.
